summary:
This simple mod makes Slaughterfish friendly towards you. This enables you to fast travel and wait, without having to hunt down those pesky little buggers.

Enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]Slaughterfish Don't Attack![/b][/u]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Jh40Aos.png[/img]

[color=#00ff00][color=#0000ff][color=#ff0000][color=#00ffff]All my mods will always be [u]free[/u].[/color][/color][/color][/color]

[u][b]Introduction[/b][/u]

I have always been bothered that you can not fast travel or wait in a location where Slaughterfish are present. Even though I am standing on solid grounds, and the Slaughterfish is down in the water. In this mod, slaughterfish will never attack you, giving you the ability to Wait or Fast travel.


[u][b]Compatability[/b][/u]

Should be compatible with all mods that do not alter the Slaughterfish's properties.

Known incompatabilities:
[b]SkyTEST - Realistic Animals&Predators[/b]
This is a mod that adds other types of Slaughterfish, like Slaughterfish Brood and Slaughterfish Fry. My mod does not affect these new types of fish. However, they don't collide with each other, so you [i]can[/i] use them together.


[u][b]Installation[/b][/u]

Simply install with Nexus Mod Manager.

Manual:

Extract "Slaughterfish Dont Attack.esp" into the Skyrim/data folder. Don't forget to actually activate the mod in the skyrim pre-launcher, under "Data Files".


[b][u]My other mods[/u][/b]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58510/?]iActivate (2,500+ Endorsements)[/url][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53181/?]Make Haste[/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34224]Vendor Sale Delay - Gone (1,000+ Endorsements)[/url][/center]
